languages.text: "Меня терзают темные предчувствия, что встреча эта не завершится бескровно для нас, но все равно я благодарю тебя за гостеприимные слова".
"I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."
languages.original_text: "Меня терзают темные предчувствия, что встреча эта не завершится бескровно для нас, но все равно я благодарю тебя за гостеприимные слова".

traits.locale_text: "I have a vague feeling this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "I have a vague feeling this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."

traits.locale_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."

traits.locale_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."

traits.locale_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: « Mon petit doigt me dit que cette rencontre va se solder par un bain de sang, mais je vous remercie pour votre gentillesse et votre hospitalité. »
languages.original_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."

traits.locale_text: « Mon petit doigt me dit que cette rencontre va se solder par un bain de sang, mais je vous remercie pour votre gentillesse et votre hospitalité. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «Tengo la sospecha de que este encuentro terminará con derramamiento de sangre, pero te agradezco la hospitalidad y la amabilidad de todos modos».
languages.original_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo la sospecha de que este encuentro terminará con derramamiento de sangre, pero te agradezco la hospitalidad y la amabilidad de todos modos».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “我隐约感觉这场会面会变成流血冲突，不过，我依然要感谢你的热情好客。”
languages.original_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."

traits.locale_text: “我隐约感觉这场会面会变成流血冲突，不过，我依然要感谢你的热情好客。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「この対談が流血の終幕を迎えるのではないかと薄々疑っているのだ。だがそれでも、優しい言葉と歓待には感謝しよう」
languages.original_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."

traits.locale_text: 「この対談が流血の終幕を迎えるのではないかと薄々疑っているのだ。だがそれでも、優しい言葉と歓待には感謝しよう」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Ich habe den leisen Verdacht, dass dieses Treffen im Blutvergießen enden wird, doch ich danke Euch dennoch für die freundlichen Worte und die Gastfreundschaft."
languages.original_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe den leisen Verdacht, dass dieses Treffen im Blutvergießen enden wird, doch ich danke Euch dennoch für die freundlichen Worte und die Gastfreundschaft."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "İçimde bu görüşmenin kanla son bulacağına dair bir his var ama yine de nazik sözlerin ve misafirperverliğin için teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "I have a sneaking suspicion this meeting will end in bloodshed, but I still thank you for the kind words and hospitality."
